This is a template post that shows off the various formatting options available for blog posts.

Headings

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
Heading 6

Text Formatting

This is bold and this is italic. You can also use bold and italic.

Lists

An unordered list:

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
    • Sub-item 2.1
    • Sub-item 2.2

An ordered list:

  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Code Blocks

Here’s a shell command:

ls -l

Here’s some Python code:

def hello_world():
    print("Hello, world!")

And here’s some JavaScript:

console.log("Hello, from JavaScript!");

Images

Horizontal Rule

The line above is a horizontal rule, created with ---.
